title: 108: Holiday Reviews
description:
Four days and seven scores ago, Tim Allen learned the secrets of Santa Claus from his father. And now we’re here to pass those secrets on to you. Enjoy!

Support us on Patreon to listen to the bonus episode! patreon.com/beachtoosandy

Watch Alex’s special Christmas stream this Friday! https://twitch.tv/XandySchiefer

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
